records.Description__c:
• Design, and Deploy Salesforce Platform Encryption solution for Financial Services company.
  • Communicate design, project plan, and road map to customer on the project.
  • Work with Developer to assign config and programmatic updates to platform to support project.
  • Work with 3rd party vendor to support limitations encountered with deployment of encryption.
  • Release Manager for client in Consulting Services vertical.

records.Course_Name__c: Working with Data and Dashboards in Wave Analytics

records.Description__c:
• On-Site support for US Coast Guard Logistics Software Systems.
  • Managed team of developers and testers to meet project schedule deadlines.
  • Collaborated with team on resolving design issues.
  • Provided Database Administration support for Oracle and SQL Server 2012 Databases.
  • Managed code in Team Foundation Server, and assisted in staging code for releases.
  • Created Release Notes, Project Workbooks, and other assorted documents to meet customer requirements.

• Spearheaded implementation of Salesforce as CRM System for organization to improve customer support tracking and recoup lost revenue from Customers that lapsed on maintenance.
  • Deployed IIS .NET based enterprise FOIA/ATIP request management systems in Federal Government agency Windows environments with MS SQL and Oracle database server back-ends both remotely and at customer sites.
  • Provided Tier 2 Remote and On-Site Support (IIS Web Server, SQL and Oracle database, and Windows workstation troubleshooting) to agencies, agency administrators, support teams, and to Tier 1 support.
  • Administrator to company’s Salesforce instance.
  • Tested AINS COTS/GOTS product installs and databases for bugs and issues.
  • Liaison between customer and off-shore development team to meet customer needs and meet government requirements.
  • Created, Edited, and collaborated on software technical documentation.

records.Course_Name__c: Programmatic Development using Apex and Visualforce

records.Description__c:
Minor in Information Systems Management.

Courses included Windows Administration, Database Administration, Technical Writing, and Programming.

• Deployed end-user workstations for the Navy Marine Corps Intranet (NMCI) project.
  • Imaged workstations; including installing various software programs and configuring network settings.
  • Troubleshoot and replace hardware on Dell desktop and laptop computers.

records.Course_Name__c: Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming using Apex

records.Description__c:
• Lead team on new DevOps methodology for increased development and release velocity and reducing bottlenecks in processes.
  • Lead migration effort off of Salesforce change sets to AutoRABIT Continuous Integration platform with integration to AWS CodeCommit Git repository, Rally Agile Central.
  • Collaborate with the scrum teams with solution design, provide guidance on development strategy, development and implementation planning.
  • Acting lead platform administrator providing support and mentoring to business administrators as well as remediation urgent issues on the Salesforce platform.
  • Utilize security tools and support security team to ensure that Platform configuration, and all code passes security requirements.
  • Regularly researching tools and methodology improvements. Including proof of concepts and delivery of Lightning Assessment, new business units, and review of Roles and Profiles.
  • Working with Security team to integrate Salesforce logging, and Event Monitoring with Splunk.
  • Worked with Salesforce on Platform Deterministic Encryption and Einstein Analytics encryption. This included testing features in Sandboxes and providing feedback to Salesforce project managers.
  • Provide guidance to data team on when to use ETL (Talend), API integration Mulesoft, Apex Dataloader, and Salesforce Connect (ODATA).

records.Course_Name__c: Building Lenses, Dashboards, and Apps in Wave Analytics

records.Description__c:
• Design and implementing DevOps Salesforce development model for leading national healthcare provider.
  • Working with Vlocity to incorporate development activities into DevOps processes and AutoRABIT platform.
  • Oversee progress and provide guidance to Release Engineers and scrum teams.

• Managed the project implementation partner for the rollout of Salesforce. Collaborated with the implementation partner in the design to ensure that recorded business requirements were satisfied.
  • Led the selection of a Salesforce implementation partner to assist in the deployment of Salesforce.
  • Lead Salesforce Admin for company instance.
  • Managed project plan and creates reports to be distributed to executive staff.
  • Implemented several external components including Single Sign-On, ExactTarget, and installed various Salesforce apps to support business processes.
  • Created Project Management and Configuration tracking documentation.
